entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 02:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -26.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -33.1°C
Wind: WNW 38 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
